titles.title: Select Agent Program and Biosafety Improvement Act of 2009

A bill to reauthorize the Select Agent Program by amending the Public Health Service Act and the Agriculture Bioterrorism Protection Act of 2002 and to improve oversight of high containment laboratories.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2559-2561)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
